title: Optimum Unisex Street Football - Top-Grade Durable Korean Rubber, Long-Lasting Tire Grip, Ideal for Concrete & Asphalt, All-Weather
features: Durable Construction: Made from high-quality Korean synthetic leather, the Optimum Street Football is designed to withstand tough playing conditions.
description: Product Description What material is the Optimum Street Football made from? The Optimum Street Football is constructed from high-quality Korean synthetic leather, providing durability and the ability to withstand tough playing conditions. Is the football suitable for outdoor play on different surfaces? Yes, the Optimum Street Football is designed for multi-surface use, making it ideal for playing on grass, turf, and even concrete. What sizes are available for the Optimum Street Football? The football comes in multiple sizes, including mini, size 3, size 4, and size 5, to accommodate players of all ages and skill levels. Does the football offer good grip and control? Yes, the textured surface of the Optimum Street Football enhances grip and allows for better control during play, ensuring a superior playing experience. What makes the design of this football unique? The football features a distinctive black and yellow pattern, offering high visibility and an eye-catching appearance during games.
